import "./postDetail.css" import { ChatBubbleOutline, FavoriteBorder, Share, BookmarkBorder, MoreHoriz, SentimentSatisfiedAlt, Favorite } from "@mui/icons-material"; import {useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {fetchPostDetail, getPosts, getPostsbyID, likePost} from "../../redux/postsSlice"; import PostAuthor from "./postAuthor"; import PostAvatar from "./postAvatar"; import {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import {useAuth} from "../../hooks"; import TimeAgo from "./TimeAgo"; const PostDetail = () => { const auth = useAuth() const dispatch = useDispatch() const { postId } = useParams() const post = useSelector(getPosts) const [likes, setLikes] = useState(post?.likes) const hasLikedPost = post.likes.find((like) => like === auth._id) useEffect(()=> { dispatch(fetchPostDetail({id: postId})) }, [postId]) if (!post) { return null } const handleLike = () => { dispatch(likePost({id: post._id, userId: auth._id})) .unwrap() .then() .catch(err => { return err.message }) if (hasLikedPost) { setLikes(post.likes.filter((id) => id !== auth._id)); } else { setLikes([...post.likes, auth._id]); } } return (
